content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -28.0, -61.0)
- Storage chest (position -27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter (position -26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace (position -25.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter (position -23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest (position -22.5, -58.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -53.0)
- Storage chest (position -17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter (position -16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace (position -15.0, -51.0)
- Burner inserter (position -13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest (position -12.5, -50.5)

### Coal Mining Setup at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position 41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest (position 41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter (position 41.5, -79.5)

### Power Generation Complex at (-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position -4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler (position -4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump (position -3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups (fluid systems 3849, 3851)

### Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest (position 5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter (position 6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine (position 8.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter (position 10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest (position 11.5, 13.5)
- Connected by belt groups for material transport

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Always verify item existence in container before attempting extraction
- Check container inventory contents using inspect_inventory() before extraction
- Handle cases where expected items are not present

### Errors with furnace operations
- Ensure furnace has both fuel and input materials before attempting to extract output
- Wait for smelting process to complete before attempting to extract products
- Verify furnace status and contents before operations

### Assembling machine resource management
- Monitor assembling machine input inventory to ensure all required ingredients are available
- Handle ingredient shortage situations appropriately
- Ensure proper resource flow through inserters and belts

### Storage management
- Keep track of storage chest contents
- Handle situations where storage is empty or has insufficient items
- Implement proper resource distribution between storage and production facilities

### Space management
- Check for output blockages in production lines
- Ensure proper placement of sink objects to prevent backup
- Monitor and handle "waiting for space in destination" situations
